players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, watch out! I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious."
Bob: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Stay quiet and avoid suspicion."
You: "I'm keeping an eye on things. Charlie, be careful."
Bob: "Charlie, stay hidden. Villagers, be vigilant."
You: "Charlie, keep low. Bob, stay alert. We need to work together."
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, mafioso. Stay alert, Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, watch out! I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious."
You: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Stay quiet and avoid suspicion."
Alice: "I'm keeping an eye on things. Charlie, be careful."
You: "Charlie, stay hidden. Villagers, be vigilant."
Alice: "Charlie, keep low. Bob, stay alert. We need to work together."
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, mafioso. Stay alert, Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

Alice: "I'm keeping an eye on things. Charlie, be careful."
Bob: "Charlie, stay hidden. Villagers, be vigilant."
Alice: "Charlie, keep low. Bob, stay alert. We need to work together."
